first.name: Restaurant 't nonnetje'
first.review: Very nice view over the water. The food is alright, not very special but the view makes up for it

second.name: London Eye 2
second.review: It was a bit meh. Totally overrated, although it gives a good overview of the city

third.name: London Eye 3
third.review: Boring. Waited for an hour to get in, was done in 10 minutes. Waste of time

properties.name: Awesome little restaurant
properties.review: This is one of those gems you don't see on trip advisor or any website. This is a beautifull little restaurant that is run by two amazing people. They are very kind and generous. Furthermore, the prices are very reasonable, this is cheap compared to the restaurants in the city

properties.name: Great bar
properties.review: A great bar where you can watch soccer or any other sports that's live on tv. My friend and I had a great time here and Tom the bartender was very kind.

properties.name: Souvenir shop
properties.review: Cheap store to buy some dutch souvenirs. Definitely buy your souvenirs here instead of Amsterdam or Schiphol.

properties.name: Snackbar de Halte
properties.review: Good looking snackbar with not so good tasting food

properties.name: Beer heaven
properties.review: If you want to buy some special beers, this is the place to be. They have around 2000 kind of beers, it's amazing!!!

properties.name: Restaurant de boot
properties.review: We had some lunch here. It was nice to sit and eat here, the view of the water and the harbor is very pretty.

properties.name: Nice and quiet park
properties.review: Quiet little park, we did a little picknick here and it was very nice.

properties.name: Coffeeshop Relax
properties.review: They have great stuff to help you relax but the coffee is not so good. This is a dutch coffeeshop that sells weed and other soft drugs

properties.name: Cafe Oasis
properties.review: A basic cafe where you can get something to drink and eat. Don't expect to much. The waiter who helped us was very grumpy and that is why I give it 2 stars

first.name: London Eye 1
first.review: Great way to get an overview of London and the Themes. Costs about 10 pounds but totally worth it.

second.name: London Eye 2
second.review: It was a bit meh. Totally overrated, although it gives a good overview of the city

third.name: London Eye 3
third.review: Boring. Waited for an hour to get in, was done in 10 minutes. Waste of time

first.name: Tower Bridge first
first.review: Beautiful old bridge, a real London landmark. Can't be missed when you visit London.

second.name: Second Tower Bridge second
second.review: Beautiful old bridge, a real London landmark. Can't be missed when you visit London.

properties.name: Big Ben
properties.review: A big tower, that's about it. Nice to look at for 5 seconds if you are too lazy to look up the time yourself.

properties.name: Harrods
properties.review: Awesome store. Bought a private plane and a pet tiger.

properties.name: Royal Albert Hall
properties.review: Beautiful venue. Went to a rock concert and it was amazing. Great accoustics.

properties.name: Tottenham stadium
properties.review: Went to the Bears NFL game at the Tottenham stadium. It's a great venue for NFL games.

properties.name: Harry Potter tour
properties.review: Not a recommendation. Didn't even see Harry or Hagrid. Total waste of time and money

properties.name: City bus
properties.review: City busses are a great way to get a quick overview of the city and get to your destination quickly while sightseeing. Only cost 2 pounds, totally worth it.

properties.name: New year's eve fireworks
properties.review: Beautiful fireworks show on new year's eve. Great music, although it was really crowded. Perfect to visit London around the holidays

properties.name: Grote MichaÃ«lskerk
properties.review: Erg mooie kerk en ligt in het centrum van Zwolle. Ik ben hier op zondag ochtend geweest en toen was er een hele mooie dienst. Zeker een aanrader om een keer langs te gaan, vooral op zondag natuurlijk

properties.name: Park
properties.review: Het is een groot park maar daar is ook alles mee gezegd. Er ligt veel afval en er liggen overal hondendrollen, dus picknicken zou ik hier zeker niet doen

properties.name: Restaurant vliegend paard
properties.review: Erg leuke en gezellige studenten cafe. Veel soorten bieren en je kan hier heel goedkoop eten.

properties.name: Wezenlanden park
properties.review: Erg groot en mooi park. Hier zijn altijd mensen aan het sporten en aan het genieten van het mooie weer. Als je even wilt ontspannen kan je hier goed terecht.

properties.name: Hotel Van Der Valk
properties.review: Very nice hotel to stay the night. It is very new and therefore it looks great and feels very clean. I recommend it if you need to stay near Zwolle.
